trans-unit.source: Safeguard your personal data and identity
trans-unit.target: Jo persoanlike gegevens en identiteit beskermje

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Surf the web and use your favorite apps freely without being tracked
trans-unit.target: Frijút op ynternet sneupe en jo favorite apps brûke sûnder folge te wurden

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Keep confidential materials safe via our premium data encryption
trans-unit.target: Fertroulike materialen feilich hâlde fia ús earsteklas gegevensfersifering

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Blocks unknown entities from seeing your private data on risky public Wi-Fi and hotspots
trans-unit.target: Foarkomt dat ûnbekende entiteiten jo priveegegevens sjen kinne op risikofolle iepenbiere wifi en hotspots

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Protection wherever you are, from restaurants to vacation rentals
trans-unit.target: Beskerming wêr’t jo ek binne, fan restaurants oant fakânsjeferhier
Ferbining meitsje mei mear as 30 lannen

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Browse and access content from all over the world
trans-unit.target: Blêdzje troch en tagong krije ta ynhâld fan oer de hiele wrâld

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Shop on a regional server to get localized deals like cheaper airfare
trans-unit.target: Winkelje op in regionale server om lokalisearre deals te krijen, lykas goedkeapere fleantickets

trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN secures the connection between your device and the web. Here’s some of the most useful features your VPN offers:
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN befeiliget de ferbining tusken jo apparaat en ynternet. Hjir binne inkelde fan de tûkste funksjes dy’t jo VPN biedt:

trans-unit.source: The top uses and benefits of using Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: De wichtichste tapassingen en foardielen fan Mozilla VPN
